page.title: 18Block D10_D12
page.content: ...have been bought by the present owners.Within the area are the ruins of the first tavern of the village_ { {"Y Ffansi"}.The area also contains the villages' oldest church_Capel Ifan_ a 13'th century "chapel of ease".Capel Ifan Farm is one of the oldest in the area. {Block D11}An area of small farms.The land is of rough pasture_most of it having been re_landscaped by the N.C.B. after a programme of open_cast mining in the past few years.Traversed by the B4306, it houses {Marchoglwyn {Mansion}built in 1684. {Block D12}An area of rough pastureland _one section being traversed by the Llanelli_Mynydd Mawr railway(now closed) which was constructed in 1884 and which linked the port of Llanelli with the coalmines and lime stone quarries of the Mynydd Mawr.
